xosd_g.c File Reference

This file contains a template for configuration table of Xilinx MVI Video On-Screen-Display (OSD) devices. More...

#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xosd.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Variables

  • XOSD_Config XOSD_ConfigTable []
    The configuration table for On-Screen-Display devices.

Detailed Description

This file contains a template for configuration table of Xilinx MVI Video On-Screen-Display (OSD) devices.

For a real hardware system, Xilinx Platform Studio (XPS) will automatically generate a real configuration table to match the configuration of the OSD devices.
